thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Five Options for Iran After Trump’s Withdrawal From Nuclear Pact

author: Laurence Norman
title: Five Options for Iran After Trump’s Withdrawal From Nuclear Pact
text:
Here is a look at Iran’s options after President Donald Trump announced he will pull the U.S. out of the 2015 nuclear agreement.
1. Stick With It
Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said Tuesday night that if Iran can get the benefits of the 2015 nuclear deal without the U.S., it could stick to it. European leaders have always said they would... RELATED VIDEO President Trump Announces Exit From Iran Deal President Trump announced Tuesday that the U.S. will withdraw from the Iran nuclear deal and reinstate sanctions on Tehran. He called the deal “defective” and said it didn't do enough to stop the country from developing nuclear weapons. Photo: Getty Images
